content: I want to help people learn how to heal themselves. As a health coach I can help people understand proper nutrition practices and health protocols to ensure a healthy lifestyle.

I think we‚Äôve covered this before enrollment! üòä I have to say that your personal attention to my inquiry was a large part of my decision to take this step. I truly feel supported. In a nutshell, in order to care for my husband currently undergoing chemotherapy for colorectal cancer, I had to leave my job at the hospital as an Ultrasound technologist in May this year. I‚Äôd really love to build on my healthcare background to help people struggling with health problems while staying home with him at this time. Who knows what the future will bring!

I am a retired nurse who has experienced a lot of different types of nursing and all were good. Now retired I was looking for something to fill the void that was part of my life for 40 years. Whatever I was searching for was not to include a 5 AM alarm, a 2 hour a day commute, and no weekends or holidays. Don't misunderstand though, I do not mind putting my heart and soul into my work. At this point of my life I would like it to be on my terms not to be so selfish. I am a certified health coach. I passed the exam last year but have not worked at this yet. I put things in place but have not marketed and so on. Your introduction was very interesting. I am someone who loves to evaluate and analyze things. I love to problem solve. Although I love many aspects of nursing, I truly love working with behavioral health or women's health. I decided that this may be what I need to move forward, and am hoping that this will take me where I want to go. Unfortunately now older, I can see it is harder for me to learn than when younger. I will need to put in the extra but that is fine with me. With the holidays coming I may be limited on some time since we will be going away for a week and having family visit for another week but I will certainly do my best. Thank. you for letting me express myself.   Diane

I hold a D.D.S. degree in Mexico but when I immigrated to the USA, I could not practice as a Dentist in California without going back to school. There were no schools near me, so I became a Health Educator/Health Coach and went into Public Health. I've worked in colleges, clinics and hospitals for 25+ years, educating people of all ages and socio-economic backgrounds on disease prevention and health promotion. Health and healing have always been my passion, so as I get older and realize that illnesses and diseases are more rampant than ever (mostly due to the health system being broken, plus the chemicals and hidden sugars in prepackaged foods and sedentarism) my desire is to serve those that have not found solutions in traditional medicine, so they can live healthier and happier lives. I'm also a Certified Life Coach, a T2 Diabetes Counselor, and I hold a diploma in Humanistic Psychology, which have helped me understand human behavior at a deeper level. I believe my combined education can greatly improve the lives of many.

I started having health issues at 32 years old after doing some painting in my first house I bought. The window were open while doing that. A week later,I started having dizzy spells,light headedness,sensitivity to fluorescent lights at home stores. I went to the dr. and he couldn't figure it out,giving me multiple prescriptions to try,that failed. I saw an ad in our local newspaper from a chiropractor who practice naturopathy modalities that was doing a seminar on finding out what is wrong with a person with ailments,naturally. I went to her for many years and she did some good things that helped,but still not to cure my illness. I became multiple chemical sensitive to everything with fragrances,gasoline,exhaust fumes,camp fires etc. I still have these symptoms and no one has been able to figure it out. Throughout the years since 2000,I became really intrigued to naturopathy and homeopathy alternative medicine and supplementation. From that point on,I had dreamed about becoming certified but didn't as prices were so high,that I could never afford it. So after caring for my elderly parents starting in 2012 and watching them deteriorate while the doctors give them all these toxic medications and misdiagnose,I knew someday I would turn to finding an opportunity like this. The final motivation was caring for my 88 year old mom at my home and having her live with me was a very life learning experience till she passed away this year on February 1st,2025. It was a super peaceful passing that I was so lucky to experience,just as my Dad's passing in September,2018 was also wonderful. Both did not show signs of pain or suffering. With my mom,I chose to not have any morphine paing meds of any kind and prayed that she would not need them and she didn't! The hospice team could not believe it,neither could I. It has been a trying time since her passing and I miss her dearly. I am healing little by little. I now know that I need purpose in my life to help educate others which I have been doing on a small level with friends and family. I always thought if I would of done this years ago and learned about functional medicine of how I could of helped both my mom and dad amongst many others. I have been out of work since my mom passed as I was her PCA and completed every single task for her to the end. So I know I have some knowledge,empathy more than anything to want to learn and get certified to help so many others along with my own health struggles that people don't teach or know. I have spent so much money over 25 years seeing many different practicioners which changed my life journey,but not to my expectations. With that being said,it is now my time to be the healer,life helper and make the money that I deserve!

At the worse, I can only work 5 hours a day and then needs to stay in bed for the rest of day. I put on weight, lost my ability to dance, eventually I started having insomnia before my period. I did not like the doctor‚Äôs sales strategy, and found a coach instead. After getting my food sensitivity test result, my nerve pain disappeared within 2 months. I am on the fourth month of my gut healing journey. And know I can dance and weight lift again. My TSH is still high at 6.75. And it probably will take a while for my body to be ready for pregnancy.
